item.title: Bangalore to Tirumala Trip Plan
item.description: Two days Trip from Bangalore to Tirumala to Bangalore, If you are a couple riding on bike or you are a family driving in car, then this two days plan works very well. Below is the route mentioned where you can plan accordingly. You can book the Dharshna Tickets & Stay via Online Booking or you can get it once you reach their based on the Crowd on Tirumala. Tirumala i
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
